about_the_game:
"Xianzong Lu" is a simulation and cultivation sandbox game. Players assume the role of the sect master of a cultivation sect, starting from scratch to create their own sect, exploring various secret realms and the world of cultivation. Recruit princesses from the immortal realm, holy maidens, snake queen, prominent saints, and empresses as disciples. Experience the authentic and exciting plot of cultivation novels and engage in thrilling battles.

Manage Your Sect

Construct various sect buildings, manage disciples, and cultivate farms.

Recruit Disciples

Regularly, mortal disciples will come to your sect seeking to join. Travel through the world, make friends, and bring them back to your sect.

Explore Secret Realm Dungeons

Engage in battles in the "meat pigeon" mode, freely combining martial techniques and secret arts for exhilarating combat.
